title: Senior Link Building Manager
job_overview:
We need an experienced link builder who can deliver 30+ high-quality links per week. No link farms allowed. 

Requirements:

1. Expert in Pitchbox (prospecting, inspection, inbox management)
2. Proven link building track record (preferably having worked in a link building agency) 
3. Proficient in Ahrefs, SEMrush, and other major SEO tools
4. Direct experience with SaaS, Enterprise, and Healthcare clients OR high competition niches

What You'll Do:

1. Secure 30+ legitimate links weekly (zero tolerance for link farms)
2. Execute enterprise-level campaigns independently
3. Build and manage a small team as we scale

Compensation:

PHP 100,000 Base salary + performance bonuses when you hit quarterly targets

How To Apply
 
Email a comprehensive and unique cover letter to Upgrade to see actual info telling us why youâ€™re the best person for the job. Use the email subject line "Senior Link Building Manager", and attach your UPDATED CV, and share your past link building results or portfolio. 

No junior applicants. We're looking for a leadership role who can start delivering results immediately.
